tokens.text: defines a feature rules document structure

title: Feature Rules Document
description: A Minecraft Bedrock Edition feature rules definition document. Feature rules control where world generation features (like trees, ores, and structures) are placed in the world based on biome conditions.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of this feature rules file. Use '1.13.0' or later.

fields.title: Feature Rules
fields.description: The feature rules definition containing description and conditions.

fields.title: Description
fields.description: Contains the identifier and the feature to place.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The unique identifier for this feature rule.

fields.title: Places Feature
fields.description: The identifier of the feature to place.

fields.title: Conditions
fields.description: Conditions that control where the feature is placed.
